name: Blind Love (itch) (Giacomo "Panda" Ravaioli)
description:
BLIND LOVE is a 2D puzzle game about two entities so in love with each other that their love is making them blind.

Your beloved one has disappeared. In a story old as the Italian plumber's one, an evil heartless mage "Coldheart" has kidnapped and placed him/her in an intricate maze. You have to rescue him/her, but the feelings you have towards him/her make you blind.

Change which elements you can see in a randomly generated maze; you can see have only one information active at each moment. (time left, walls, bombs, pits, power ups, etc.)

Find your soulmate before you run out of time.

The game has been developed in one week following GMTK 2019 August Game Jam's theme "Only one...". I've decided to take on the theme working on explicit information hiding, making only one information available to the player at each moment.
